company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: • Developing and assisting in the delivery of cost-effective site maintenance plans.• Assigning repair schedules and evaluating repair cost estimates.• Designing preventive maintenance programs.• Designing and updating all needed processes and procedures and ensuring implementation.• Developing and implementing condition and predictive maintenance policies.• Handling the training and development needs of new hires and existing staff.• Managing pre schedule training program to the customer.• Adhering to safety regulations.• Performing human resource responsibilities.• Collaborate with management for preparation of on-call schedule.• Coordinate after hours emergency crews and work as required.• Assessing risks.• Monitoring and managing expenditure and controlling budgets for maintenance.• Managing the Service Level Agreement (SLA).• Documenting and preparing daily progress reports and maintenance logs.• Managing maintenance facilities.• Supervising and leading all maintenance processes and operations.• Planning and overseeing all repair and installation activities.• Responsible for vendors and customers relationships.• Safe and comfortable working environments.• Ensuring all department staff adhere to the safety policies and procedures.• Complies with all statutory requirements.• Audit and review emergency paperwork and processes to ensure compliance.• Participate in on-call rotation as the on-call manager, as required.• Follow all internal policies and procedures in association with varying protocols for restoration work.• Audit and implement policies/procedure and maintenance levels in the content processing department. This will also include warehousing/storage of all contents.• Audit all personnel uniform requirements and needs.• Flexible to meet changing needs.• Carrying out operations and maintenance reviews to the agreed standard (international, country, organization, project).• Conducting regular inspections of the facilities to detect and resolve problems.• Advising of changes in maintenance techniques that may be beneficial in terms of improved service levels or provide cost reduction.• Checking electrical and hydraulic systems of buildings to ensure functionality.• Maintaining all machinery to ensure it is at working standards.• Monitoring and overseeing equipment inventory and place orders when necessary.• Manage fleet vehicles: monthly vehicle inspections, fuel consumption, GPS Tracking, proper cleanliness, record monthly kms on pool vehicles, budget maintenance and/or replacement of vehicle fleet, approve vehicle repairs and direct assignments.• Being responsible for negotiating for maintenance contracts and managing the selected contractors to achieve the program.• Managing relationships with contractors and service providers.• Allocate workload and supervise upkeep staff (Custodians, Building Superintendents etc.).• Represent maintenance interests in meetings.• Other tasks assigned by line manager.
Job Requirement: • Proven experience as maintenance operations manager or other managerial roles in a mid-large organization that maintain both software and outdoor equipment.• Experience in planning maintenance operations.• Knowledge in engineering and Life Cycle Costs calculation – advantage.• Working knowledge of facilities, machines and equipment.• Solid understanding of operations and technical aspects (Engineering, plumbing, carpentry, electrical systems, manufacturing and logistics, product introduction etc.), financial and analytical skills• Experience in progress monitoring alongside a delivery program. • Fluency in English.• Driving license – advantage.• Independent and individual abilities, able to work well under pressure.• Excellent communication, coordination and interpersonal skills.• Ability to solve practical problems and deal with a variety of concrete variables in situations.• Solution orientated used in fast-track environments.• Ability to keep track of and report on activity.• Ability to interpret a variety of instructions furnished in written, oral, diagram, or schedule form; Ability to work and to deal with different cultures.• Being responsible and ethical.• Being analytical and strategic.• Outstanding organizational and leadership abilities.• A minimum of 5 years’ experience in maintenance.• Excellent organizational and leadership abilities.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Sourcing from other sources, purchase goods and services and negotiate for best price and good term of payments
• Cooperate with Shops, Standard Company or wholesale for purchase
• Search for new suppliers, and competitors to compete with existing suppliers
• Prepare Debit note and Credit note
• Cooperate and build good relationship with relevant departments to identify the specific needs
• Make sure the purchased items matches with the requirement
• Manage Petty Cash and prepare expense report and credit daily in computer for Procurement Supervisor
• Make sure to check with stock keeper before ordering.
Job Requirement: • A bachelor degrees in Business Administration, Accounting or any other relevant fields• At least 1-2 years of work experiences in Procurement and sourcing• Familiar with Windows Live Mail and MS. Office is highly desired, not mandatoryfor SUN system• Understanding logistics concepts• Familiarity with sourcing, vendor management and warehouse stock report and control• Solid judgement along with decision making skills;• Good oral and written both English and Khmer communication skills;• Be friendly, flexible, honest, hard-working, and be able to work under the pressure and workload.• Good negotiation, Communication, and interpersonal skills and problem solving skills;• Ability to Prioritize tasks• Experience in construction purchase is a must.**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារសូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព 4x6។បេក្ខជន បេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់អាចមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំធ្វើការនៅអគារលេខ223 និង227, មហាវិថីម៉ៅសេទុង ឬតាមរយៈអ៊ីមែល: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, Website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh, www.mjqjobs.com, Mengly J. Job Description: • Perform routine examinations of patients.• Understand patients’ health conditions based on symptoms and tests.• Suggest treatments based on findings.• Give appropriate health service.• Set diagnosis based on medical expertise and knowledge.• Access patient’s medical history.• Examine, analyze and interpret lab test results. • Provide different medical treatments, medications and drugs.• Collaborate with team members.• Keep records of patients’ progress and history.• Adhere to laws, rules and regulations.• Refer patients to specialists if necessary.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Perform regular annual exams on patient
• Analyze records, reports, test results, or examination information to diagnose medical condition of the patient
• Explain procedures and discuss test result or prescribed treatment with patients
• Collect, record, and maintain patient information such as medical histories, reports, and examination results
• Monitor patient over the course of pregnancies
• Treat infection of the cervix, ovaries and Fallopian tubes
• Identify cancerous growths within the reproductive system
• Refer patient to medical specialist or another practitioner when necessary
• Provide postnatal care to new mother
• Educated patients on practices that promote wellness and health and instructed on a measure to Detect any abnormality or aberration in the female body such as breast self-examination
Job Requirement:
• Associate Degree Nursing from Phnom Penh, Institution of Paramedical and Medical Science/Colleges in Environmental Science at Pannasastra University of Cambodia related to closely field
• 4 years of OB-GYN residency
• 2 years+ of practicing medicine in a hospital or private practice
• 2 years+ experience as an obstetric or abdominal ultrasound technician
• Proficient at patient charting and knowledgeable in relevant charting computer program

**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖
•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ
•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ

សូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព 4x6។
បេក្ខជន បេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់អាចមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំធ្វើការនៅអគារលេខ223 និង227, មហាវិថីម៉ៅសេទុង ឬតាមរយៈអ៊ីមែល: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, Website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh, www.mjqjobs.com, Mengly J. Quach Education PLC, MJQ Jobs, Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 61 700 181

Job Description: - Managing construction and renovation projects.- Project manage and coordinate asset installation or disposition.- Ensuring compliance with health and safety regulations.- Ensure that safe working practices are adhered to by all contractors in allProjects to meet regulatory & legal requirements.- Ensure company safe working practices are implemented and adhered to atall times within our site services team's operations.- Develop and implement long-term facilities plans for the company to includeplanned preventative maintenance programs for all facility-related aspects ofsite operations.- Develop and implement long-term facilities plans for the company to includeplanned preventative maintenance programs for all facility-related aspects ofsite operations.- Investigate, and assist in resolving operational issues in the company plant,machinery, services, and equipment on demand.- Develop budgets and control costs.- Provide project plans and reports as necessary.- Perform other tasks assigned by the line manager.
Job Requirement: - Graduated Bachelor in Civil Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or other related field.- At least 5 years experience in Site Service Manager or related field.- Experience with safe work practices including the use of proper PPE.- Strong understanding of design and construction management.- Knowledgeable and strong analytical skills in the real estate Market.- Well-knowledge of Contract/Agreement development.- Advanced level in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, and PowerPoint, AutoCAD)- Language Proficiency in both English and Khmer in verbal and written communication.
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net Phnom Penh #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

Company Profile:
AIA Cambodia is part of the AIA Group, which is currently the largest independent publicly listed pan-Asian life insurance group and the largest life insurance company in the world by market capitalisation. With our various campaigns and programs so far, we have positively impacted the lives of many thousands more. 

The scale and reach of our business provide a springboard for you to build the right skills and to grow professionally and personally. Join our bold team of young, passionate and talented individuals who thrive to invent positive impacts that uphold our brand promise – help Cambodians live healthier, longer and better lives.

Location: Phnom Penh，Phnom Penh，Siem Reap，Phnom Penh，Phnom Penh，Phnom Penh，Phnom Penh，Phnom Penh，Phnom Penh
Job Description: - Read and publicize all official memo(s) to students, attend all meetings and orientation at the beginning and/or throughout the term (meetings and orientation are mandatory).- Organize games and challenges that promote physical activity among children and young adults from pre-kid to kid program.- Develop motor skills and physical development among younger children and proper exercise. - Adjust their curricula to adapt to children with different physical abilities.- Have strong speaking and listening skills of English because he/she communicates with students in English. - Communicate and demonstrate interpersonal skills and enthusiasm to students.- Observe all their students and maintain discipline within the session.- Interact with parents, other teachers and school administrators.- Follow course syllabus provided by Aii Language Center.  - Be well-planned for her/ his instruction.- Initiate, plan, organize, and participate in activities, including extracurricular activities, training, and workshops (extracurricular activity is mandatory if required).- Work in collaboration with Aii Language Center management team.- Contribute productively to the school as a whole.- Other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement: - Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative.- Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views.- Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks.- An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude.- Computer knowledge.- Ability to understand and keep within a budget.- Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English.- Strong administrative and organizational skills.- Understand individual group behaviors and motivations as to create a safe learning environment.- Create learning environments that encourage positive social interaction and self-motivation.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: 012 797 939Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

job title: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកលក់/ Sales Retail (15 positions) $230-$300+Commission
position: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកលក់/ Sales Retail (15 positions) $230-$300+Commission
Job Description:
• ត្រូវដើរលក់និងផ្សព្វផ្សាយផលិតផល របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនតាមហាង ម៉ាត នៅក្នុងរាជធានីភ្នំពេញជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។ Must sell and promote the company's products in marts in Phnom Penh on a daily។
• ត្រូវចុះសួរសុខទុកអតិថិជនដែលយកផលិតផលក្រុមហ៊ុនទៅលក់រាយបន្តជាប្រចាំ។  Must visit customers who take the company's products to retail on a regular basis.
• ត្រូវសាកសួរណែនាំអ្នកលក់បន្ត អំពីការស្ថានភាពនៃការលក់ផលិតផលរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន និង ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធាននៅពេលល្ងាច។ Have to ask the retail about the company's product selling and report to manager in the evening.
• ត្រូវរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ផ្នែកលក់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំសប្ដាហ៍ និងប្រចាំខែ តាមប្រព័ន្ធទំនាក់ទំនង ឡាញ (Line) មកប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងផ្នែកលក់ឲ្យបានទាន់ពេល/ Prepare Daily, Weekly, and Monthly Sales report to Sales Section Manager by the timeline.
Job Requirement:
• ត្រូវមានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច ១ឆ្នាំ/ At least one year experiences.
• ត្រូវបញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់ទី១២ ឬ កំពុងសិក្សារបរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ / Finished High School or Taking Bachelor Degree in related fields.
• តស៊ូ និង ព្យាយាម ចំពោះការងារ / Patient and working hard
• ត្រូវចេះធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម / Good Team work.

អត្ថប្រយោជន៏/ Benefits
• ប្រាក់ខែគោល (Basic Salary)
• ប្រាក់បន្ថែមលើការលក់ (Incentive)
• ប្រាក់អតីតភាពការងារ (Seniority Payment)
• ថ្លៃសាំប្រចាំខែ (Monthly Fuel)
• ថ្លៃកាតទូរស័ព្ទប្រចាំខែ (Monthly Phone Card)
• ថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំសប្ដាហ៍ (Day Off)
• ធានារ៉ាប់រងបសស(NSSF)។

លក្ខខណ្ឌការងារ៖
- ​ថ្ងៃធ្វើការ៖ ច័ន្ទ - សុក្រ (២ សប្ដាហ៍) និង ច័ន្ទ - សៅរ៍ (២ សប្ដាហ៍)/ ខែ
- ​Days of Work: Mon – Fri (2 weeks/Month) & Mon – Sat (2 weeks/Month)
-​ ម៉ោងធ្វើការ៖ ៨៖០០ ព្រឹក ដល់ ៥៖០០ ល្ងាច
- ​Working Hours: 8:00 AM – 5:00 PM

    Mistine Cambodia is the top quality cosmetics company with the best qualified products imported from Thailand. Our vision is to provide quality and beauty to all valued and beloved consumers. Job Description: • ពិនិត្យកិច្ចការសិស្ស បញ្ជីវត្តមានសិស្សមើលសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ និងវិន័យសិស្សពេល គ្រូបង្គោលបង្រៀន។• រាល់កិច្ចការសូមគោរពតាមកាលបរិច្ឆេទដែលបានកំណត់។• ជួយមើលសិស្សមុនពេលចូលរៀន ពេលចេញលេង និងពេលចេញទៅផ្ទះ។• សហការជាមួយគ្រូបង្គោលក្នុងការផលិតសម្ភារឧបទេស និងតុបតែងថ្នាក់រៀន។• ចូលរួមរាល់សកម្មរបស់សាលា។• គោរពបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងសាលាឱ្យបាន១០០%។• ធ្វើជាទូតដ៏ល្អរបស់ស្ថាប័ន។• អាននូវកំណត់ចំណាំ សេចក្តីជូនដំណឹង ព័ត៌មានថ្មីៗ ជាប្រចាំ និងអនុវត្តន៍ឱ្យបាន ១០០%។• ជូនសិស្សមកពេទ្យពេលសិស្សមានបញ្ហាសុខភាព។• ពិនិត្យមើលComment អ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលក្នុងសៀវភៅតាមដាន រួចផ្តល់ព័ត៌មានទៅគ្រូបន្ទុកថ្នាក់។	• ចូលរួមថែរក្សាទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។• បង្រៀនជំនួសនៅពេលគ្រូបង្គោល ឬគ្រូជំនាញអវត្តមាន។• ពិនិត្យមើល Comment អ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលក្នុងសៀវភៅតាមដានរួច ផ្តល់ព័ត៌មានទៅគ្រូបន្ទុកថ្នាក់ ឬអាចឆ្លើយតបជាមួយអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល។• រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំឆមាសនីមួយ និងផ្ញើជូនគណៈកម្មការតាមកាលបរិច្ឆេទដែលបានកំណត់។• ពិនិត្យមើលកិច្ចការរបស់សិស្សដូចជា កិច្ចការផ្ទះ កិច្ចការក្នុងថ្នាក់ ការសរសេរមេរៀនរបស់សិស្ស។• ជួយការងារគ្រូបង្គោល (ពិនិត្យកិច្ចការសិស្ស បញ្ជីវត្តមានសិស្ស មើលសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់សិស្សពេលគ្រូបង្គោលបង្រៀន)។• បំផុសទឹកចិត្តសិស្សឱ្យចូលរួមកម្មវិធីប្រកួតប្រជែងរបស់សាលាឱ្យបានផុសផុល។• សហការជាមួយគ្រូបង្គោលក្នុងការជួយតាមដានការសិក្សាសិស្ស។• ពិនិត្យសម្ភារសិក្សាសិស្សមុនពេលចេញទៅផ្ទះ។
Job Requirement: ចំណេះដឹង ជំនាញ និងបទពិសោធន៍:• មានបទពិសោធច្រើនឆ្នាំក្នុងការមើលកុមារ។• មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ។• ព្យាយាម និងអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារជាមួយកុមារ។• ស្រឡាញ់កុមារ និងមានមនសិការវិជ្ជាជីវៈខ្ពស់។• មានកាយសម្បទាមាំមួន។• មានភាពម៉ត់ចត់ និងទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ។របៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនង៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564ឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។*ប្រវត្តិរូបដែលគ្មានរូបថត និងមិនត្រូវបានជ្រើសរើសចូលក្នុងវគ្គសម្រាំងនោះទេ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

job title: Thai Teacher - គ្រូបង្រៀនភាសាថៃ
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: Thai Teacher - គ្រូបង្រៀនភាសាថៃ
Job Description: - Read and publicize all official memo(s) to students, attend all meetings and orientation at the beginning and/or throughout the term (meetings and orientation are mandatory).- Teach Literacy and numeracy along with personal, social and emotional skills.- Employ a variety of instructional techniques and teaching strategies to meet different aptitudes and interests of students, including whole group/ small group or individual learning.- Follow course syllabus provided by Aii Language Center.  - Help with the integration of technology into the classroom, helping set up computers and projectors, for example. - Be well planned for her/ his class. Design and follow a complete teaching plan.- Initiate, plan, organize, and participate in activities, including extracurricular activities, training, and workshops (extracurricular activity is mandatory if required).- Work in collaboration with Aii Language Center management team.- Assist in developing a curriculum that takes an overall approach to English/Chinese study and focus on a specific aspect of language use. - Teach students English/Chinese skills, such as listening, reading, writing and speaking.- Establish and maintain communication between parents of students and the school in the program.- Engage parents and families in their student’s learning and acting as an ambassador for the school in the community.- Contribute productively to the school as a whole.- Write student report cards using the online continuous assessment with their overall performance.  - Organize learning materials and resources.- Use a variety of activities and instructional methods.- Assess student’s performance and progress to ensure they are mastering the skills on regular basis.- Monitor children’s interactions and nurture cooperation and sharing.- Follow and comply with teaching standards.- Establish and enforce rules for behavior, and procedures for maintaining order.- Adapt teaching methods and instructional materials to meet students’ varying needs and interests.- And other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement: - Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative.- Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views.- Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks.- An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude.- Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media- Ability to employ technology.- Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English.- Strong administrative and organizational skills.

position: Assistant to the Office of the Founder, Chairman and CEO
Job Description: - Organize and assist the meetings- Write and review minutes and contents for meetings, speeches, announcements, letters and others.- Make sure the task list is up to date.- Follow up all tasks assigned to relevant departments and report the progresses and results.- Coordinate with relevant departments to make sure that decisions of management are well-implemented/achieved.- Assist in document reviews before approval.- Translate documents from English to Khmer and vice versa. - Assist on all aspects of communication, both internally and externally, including with media.- Assist the line managers, make sure s/he sends out response in timely manner.- Summarize brief report of external meeting.- Manage and monitor the Facebook pages, make sure that all contents, photos and comments from public are appropriate and up to date.- Manage and update relevant website contents.- Review contents of news and videos before releasing on public media.- Develop, review and update relevant policies for the company by working with relevant Senior Management and/or departments.- Organize workshop, conference, events, both internally and externally and working closely with Media team.- Other tasks assigned by Line Manager.
Job Requirement: - Excellent problem-solving skills, and able to use initiative.- Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views.- Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks.- An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude.- Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with social media.- Ability to understand and keep within a budget.- Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English.- Strong administrative and organizational skills.- Presentation Skills.- Self-Confidence.- Having strong decision making.- Having administrative writing skills.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: - A legal officer, will be tasked with a variety of duties to support the Legal Office   of MJQE- Draft separation agreements, mortgages, and contracts.- Assist lawyer in preparing for corporate meetings, trails, and hearings.- Collect case facts to ensure the consideration of all relevant information- Identify appropriate materials, legal articles, judicial decisions, and laws for assigned cases- Organize, analyze, and compile information- Develop written statements- Draft legal arguments for lawsuits- Provide Legal Advice: Using oral or written platforms, Legal Officer will be expected to brief team of staff members on legal issues, potential liabilities and possible courses of actions. This involves translating complicated legal articles into language which everyone can understand, as well as taking all possible legal problems into consideration before making any recommendations. All recommendations which the Legal Officer makes must be in complete compliance with the law, and must also strive to minimize risk for their organization.- Track and organize files from case documents to facilitate access and availability to attorney- Search legal records collected in computer databases, since laws and regulations are always changing and being modified, it’s up to the Legal Officer to continuously research legal resources such as articles, codes, statutes, judicial decisions and more. Doing so will allow the Legal Officer to stay up to date on all current laws and make well-educated legal recommendations.- Ideally, legal issues should be nipped in the bud before they even begin. This is why it’s essential for Legal Officer to regularly analyze the actions and decisions of their companies in order to identify problem areas, suggest alternative courses of action and mitigate risk as much as possible.- Support staffs, when a legal matter is underway, it’s up to the Legal Officer to direct all claim adjusters, liability attorneys and other members of the legal staff. With proper leadership, the legal staff can proceed with clarity, efficiency and confidence and hopefully resolve the matter swiftly.- Be skillful and talent in Khmer Literature including quick and accurate typing, reviewing and editing the legal contracts made by legal assistants and other departments of the company.- Perform other tasks assigned by the Manager.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

Job Description: Job Announcement𝐙𝐀𝐍𝐃𝐎 𝐂𝐨., 𝐋𝐭𝐝., the parent company of 𝐙𝐀𝐍𝐃𝐎, 𝐓𝐄𝐍𝟏𝟏, 𝐆𝐀𝐓𝐎𝐍𝐈, 𝐑𝐨𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐞, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝟑𝟔𝟏° planning to extend across the country, is currently looking for a talented and potential candidate in the position of Senior Fashion Merchandiser.Job Title: Senior Fashion MerchandiserCategory: Fashion, Merchandising, PurchasingJob Summary: Planning and developing merchandising strategies. Analyzing sales figures, customers' reactions, and market trends to anticipate product needs and collaborating with designers, operations, warehouses, and suppliers to negotiate prices, quantities, and time scales.Merchandisers are not fashion designers. He/she stays close to the fashion world and uses their fashion sense and analytical mind to determine how much of each style to purchase and stock, negotiate with manufacturers, and suppliers, and work with fashion designers to determine emerging or existing trends. Job Description:•	Keep up with the latest Fashion trend and communicate regularly with fashion designers in order to blend fashion sense with quantitative analysis by looking at how products have performed in the past and forecast consumer demands for upcoming seasons.•	Use fashion knowledge and trend analysis to decide how to purchase and stock a retail store. Decide which new styles to order, which items to reorder, the quantity of each item, and colors and sizes to stock.•	Purchase and negotiate with manufacturers and designers to make sure items can be priced in a way that will sell and make a profit.•	Determine how each store should be stocked based on store sales performance, different customer demographics, and store environment.•	Prepare budget planning for monthly stock purchases for the upcoming season, and present it to management for approval.•	Schedule timeline from production, to finish product and delivery to ensure on-time for the season.•	Other tasks assigned by Merchandising Manager.
Job Requirement: Requirements:•	BA/BS degree in Fashion Design or related field•	2-year+ experience in a product management role•	A strong ability in forecasting, analytical, negotiation, and communication skill•	Understand fashion trend and their demand•	English: usable for medium-professional setting•	Proficient in MS Office and Adobe Suites •	Ability to work independently•	Strong attention to detail*𝐎𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐫 𝐛𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐟𝐢𝐭𝐬:• Annual Bonus• Employee Discount• Birthday Package• Other benefitsInterested candidates are invited to submit their updated CV, and cover letter to our email: hr@zandokh.com or 𝙏𝙀𝙇𝙀𝙂𝙍𝘼𝙈: 𝟎𝟖𝟏 𝟐𝟕 𝟓𝟑 𝟓𝟑Join us on Telegram for more job opportunities: https://t.me/zandocareer

job title: QC and Inventory Controller អ្នកពិនិត្យគុណភាព & គ្រប់គ្រងទំនិញ
company_name: Sinh Hak Hout Trading Co., Ltd
position: QC and Inventory Controller អ្នកពិនិត្យគុណភាព & គ្រប់គ្រងទំនិញ
Job Description:
	Quality Control’s Responsibilities
o	Inspect quality of goods receiving inbound from oversea
o	Be sure all goods are in good package condition before assigning location
o	Make clear check information of goods receiving match with packing list
o	Record good and damage item into quality control document list
o	Inspect outbound delivery to customer be sure good condition of item before loading to the trucks
o	Can analyze root cause of damage Item from receiving and return into warehouse
o	Analyze and monitor on product storage and packaged to determine if risks will be happen   
o	Work toward team and individual KPIs
o	Other tasks as assigned by Management
	Inventory Controller Responsibilities
o	Achieve efficient layout of the warehouse to optimize picking efficiency
o	Maintain locations and pick faces
o	Manage cycle counting and stock take
o	Promptly address any issues with locations, receiving, put away, picking, and dispatching
o	Work closely with warehouse staff and inventory control team members to ensure accuracy of inventory count and locations
o	Action all stock/picking discrepancies
o	Manage clearance process and scheduling of inwards containers
o	Support the receiving function and paperwork
o	Manage the processing of all returned goods, including identification of saleable returned stock and returned stock to be scrapped
o	Regular reporting of inventory accuracy and other KPI’s, as required by management.
o	Monitor stock accuracy and organize replenishment if needed
o	Responsible for the purchasing and inventory levels and management of all regular stock lines
o	Other tasks as assigned by Management

HOW YOU CAN SUCCEED IN THIS ROLE
Within Sinh Hak Hout, the top-performing people who do this job always demonstrate the following attitude: 
•	Working with Others:
o	A genuine interest in the welfare of all company team member is the first and most critical requirement for this role.
o	They maintain the trust of the team member, and are regarded as fair, reasonable, approachable, and honest.  
o	They are passionate about improving staff welfare and guest satisfaction.  They are focused on achieving results and continual improvement.
o	They always try to anticipate and exceed the needs of customers and team member.
o	They use their own initiative and good judgement to solve problems in a calm and efficient way

o	They enjoy working with others to achieve common goals.  They volunteer as required to ensure the success of the team.
o	They act with personal professionalism and integrity at all times
•	Taking Responsibility:
o	They always conduct business honestly and fairly.  They keep sensitive information confidential.
o	They can prioritise their workload effectively and be organised and structured at work
o	They manage their time and pay attention to detail.  They know their jobs, and are able to work without close supervision.
o	They display a positive attitude, even under pressure.  They personally check their work to ensure its accuracy.
•	Delivering Results:
o	They are committed to meeting and exceeding all performance standards.
o	They constantly look to develop their own professional skills and abilities.
o	They perform job tasks in line with established policies and procedures.
o	They always try to provide a top-quality experience to all our team members and guests.
Job Requirement:
o	Bachelor degree Business Administration or Other relevant fields is advantage
o	3-year experience as warehouse inventory controller and Quality Controller
o	Experience in leading and motivating a small team.
o	Be able to operate a forklift
o	Fully understand warehouse operational systems and processes
o	Knowledge of inventory and supply chain management 
o	Be able to analyze problems and offer solutions
o	Ability to input, retrieve and analyze data
o	   Good time management and planning, Organizing and analytical skills. 
o	   Be able to work independently and perform tasks with limited supervision.
o	   Highly effective, dynamic, and result-oriented with strong sense of responsibility
Company Profile:
Sinh Hak Hout is one of the leading home improvement centers in Cambodia. Starting from just a 50-square-meter retail space in 1999, we have expanded our current operations into a 6400-square-meter show space. Our mission is to provide an excellent customer experience through understanding our customers’ needs and delivering high quality home improvement products across every channel and market that we serve. Our key success is based on believing that When our team members are happy, they deliver great service. When guests experience great service, they are happy. Happy guests make our business a success.

Are you a dynamic professional with a passion for success who is looking for an opportunity that will take your career to a whole new level? If yes, we wish to invite you to apply for the follow positions:

Job Description:
* HR Admin Officer Job Description 

We are looking to employ an HR and Admin Executive with outstanding administrative and communication skills. An HR and Admin Executive is expected to be a conceptual thinker with superb organizational and time management skills. You must be reliable and should accurately follow instructions with the ability to multitask and acclimatize to a fast-paced environment.
To ensure success, an HR and Admin Executive should display remarkable conflict management and decision-making skills with a solid understanding of employee relationships, staffing management, and payroll and benefits administration. Top candidates will be superb at problem-solving, efficient in scheduling, and precise in the recruitment process.

* Responsibilities:

●	Support all internal and external HR-related inquiries or requests.
●	Maintain digital and electronic records of employees.
●	 Serve as a point of contact with benefit vendors and administrators.
●	Assist with the recruitment process by identifying candidates, performing reference checks, and issuing employment contracts.
●	Control on office supplies, stationery suppliers, kitchen supplies, and make sure purchases are requested and available in stock.
●	Monito staff contracts, and personnel files.
●	Maintain calendars of the HR management team.
●	Oversee the completion of compensation and benefit documentation.
●	Assist with performance management procedures.
●	Schedule meetings, interviews, HR events and maintain agendas.
●	Coordinate training sessions and seminars.
●	Perform orientations and update records of new staff.
●	Produce and submit reports on general HR activity.
●	Complete termination paperwork and exits interviews.
●	Keep up-to-date with the latest HR trends and best practices
Job Requirement:
●	Bachelor's degree in human resources or related (essential).
●	1 years of experience as an HR assistant (essential).
●	Exposure to labor law and employment equity regulations.
●	Effective HR administration and people management skills.
●	Exposure to payroll practices.
●	Full understanding of HR functions and best practices.
●	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
●	Works well under pressure and meets tight deadlines.
●	Highly computer literate with capability in email, MS Office, and related business and communication tools.
●	Fantastic organizational and time management skills.
●	Strong decision-making and problem-solving skills.
●	Meticulous attention to detail.
●	Ability to accurately follow instructions.

* Competitive and Benefit 

1.	Base Salary 250$-400$
2.	Incentive of KPIs
3.	Incentive of award
4.	Mission allowance
5.	Annual salary adjustment 
6.	Incentive of promotion adjustment
7.	Gasoline Allowance
8.	Phone Allowance

14.	Annual party 
15.	Season party

Company Profile:
GBS is a one-stop company for coffee and tea solutions, which is reflected in our logo. Founded in 2016, GBS mission was to foster Cambodian coffee industry through the 3 pillars – product, service and knowledge.
At GBS, we always look out to bring top quality products from around the world to combine with our best-in-class after-sales service. We are currently representing more than 20 brands in Cambodian market including, Nuova Simonelli, Victoria Arduino, Caffé Barbera, Lavazza, Hario, Iberital, Eureka, ODK, Blendtec, Hoshizaki, Melitta, Proaster, D&B, Monbana, Acaia, 3M Water Filtration, and others.
Acknowledging the complication of establishing or expanding a coffee business, thanks to a wide range of product offer, GBS focuses on providing a solution-based product package according to the customers’ individual request and business demand.
We offer complementary training as our barista demonstrates their skill and know-how to assist customer for the challenges in the coffee business environment. We also offer advanced barista and latte art classes for those who would like to further develop their skills.
We take pride in our technical service, as we receive many positive feedbacks since our day one in business. We invest significantly in spare parts to ensure our customer’s machine downtime is limited to the minimum. To compliment this, we ensure that our technicians are well-trained with technical knowledge and are always ready to respond to request for maintenance and repairs.
In 2018, GBS established B-Hub Barista Training Center to offer high quality barista training with tools and resources that allow student to dive deeper into a coffee world. In 2019, GBS began moving toward commercial and specialty coffee roasting, adding three more coffee blends into our product portfolio, as well as customizing special blends to meet the demand. In May 2020, we welcome our new showroom in Siem Reap, which is 40% bigger in space with a dedicated training room.
With all

Job Description:
* Senior Accountant Job Description

We are looking for a detail-oriented senior accountant to perform and coordinate accounting duties within our organization. The senior accountant's responsibilities include preparing financial reports, performing account reconciliations, maintaining the general ledger, preparing tax returns, assisting with audit preparations, and performing other accounting duties as assigned.
To be successful as a senior accountant, you should have a solid working knowledge of Generally Accepted Accounting Principles and strong financial analysis skills. An outstanding senior accountant should also possess strong Excel skills, be detail-oriented, highly organized, and able to work with little to no supervision and perform under pressure.

* Responsibilities:

•	Coordinating accounting functions and programs.
•	Preparing financial analyses and reports.
•	Preparing revenue projections and forecasting expenditure.
•	Assisting with preparing and monitoring budgets.
•	Maintaining and reconciling balance sheet and general ledger accounts.
•	Assisting with annual audit preparations.
•	Investigating and resolving audit findings, account discrepancies, and issues of non-compliance.
•	Preparing federal, state, local, and special tax returns.
•	Contributing to the development of new or amended accounting systems, programs, and procedures.
•	Performing other accounting duties and supporting junior staff as required or assigned.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor's degree in accounting or finance required.
•	3+ years of accounting experience.
•	Working knowledge of tax laws and GAAP.
•	Strong financial analysis skills.
•	Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.
•	Strong organizational and stress management skills.
•	Proficiency in Microsoft Office, particularly with Excel.
•	Ability to train and manage staff.
•	Ability to work with little to no supervision.



*Competitive and Benefit 

-	Base Salary 450$-700$
-	Income of Commission 
-	Incentive of KPIs
- 	Incentive of award
- 	Mission allowance
- 	Incentive of promotion adjustment
-	Annual salary adjustment 
- 	Gasoline Allowance
-	Phone Allowance
- 	Health and accident insurance
-	Work time 44h/1w (8am-5pm)
-	Holiday and public holiday
-	Training and Development skill
- 	Annual trip

Company Profile:
GBS is a one-stop company for coffee and tea solutions, which is reflected in our logo. Founded in 2016, GBS mission was to foster Cambodian coffee industry through the 3 pillars – product, service and knowledge.
At GBS, we always look out to bring top quality products from around the world to combine with our best-in-class after-sales service. We are currently representing more than 20 brands in Cambodian market including, Nuova Simonelli, Victoria Arduino, Caffé Barbera, Lavazza, Hario, Iberital, Eureka, ODK, Blendtec, Hoshizaki, Melitta, Proaster, D&B, Monbana, Acaia, 3M Water Filtration, and others.
Acknowledging the complication of establishing or expanding a coffee business, thanks to a wide range of product offer, GBS focuses on providing a solution-based product package according to the customers’ individual request and business demand.
We offer complementary training as our barista demonstrates their skill and know-how to assist customer for the challenges in the coffee business environment. We also offer advanced barista and latte art classes for those who would like to further develop their skills.
We take pride in our technical service, as we receive many positive feedbacks since our day one in business. We invest significantly in spare parts to ensure our customer’s machine downtime is limited to the minimum. To compliment this, we ensure that our technicians are well-trained with technical knowledge and are always ready to respond to request for maintenance and repairs.
In 2018, GBS established B-Hub Barista Training Center to offer high quality barista training with tools and resources that allow student to dive deeper into a coffee world. In 2019, GBS began moving toward commercial and specialty coffee roasting, adding three more coffee blends into our product portfolio, as well as customizing special blends to meet the demand. In May 2020, we welcome our new showroom in Siem Reap, which is 40% bigger in space with a dedicated training room.

Job Description:
To work with the School Leaders and Head of Department, Singapore (Cambodia) International Academy Co., Ltd. (SCIA), a Cambodia registered subsidiary of SIM International Academy Pte. Ltd., The Teacher, Business and Economic is reporting to Head of Department and is responsible for:

JOB PURPOSE:
● Instruct students in subject-specific classrooms.
● Create lesson plans; evaluate student performances; and teach using lectures, technology and hands-on learning experiences.
● Model expected behaviours to establish and maintain an orderly, disciplined classroom.
● Creating daily lesson plans and learning activities for students based on Cambridge International standards in English Language education and research and knowledge of
developmental behaviours.
● Delivering high-quality, engaging instruction in the form of discussion, direct teaching, demonstrations and independent practice using a variety of proven methods.
● Differentiating lessons when needed to give all students access to the curriculum regardless of disability, instructional level, English proficiency or level of interest in the subject.
● Evaluating student performance on tasks established by the standards using different methods such as observation, performance-based tasks or other standard test practices.
● Maintaining a safe, orderly and supportive classroom by modelling expected behaviours and standards, promoting positive interactions and quickly addressing behaviours that are not in line with the school discipline plan.
● Communicating with parents regarding student progress, potential and behaviours periodically through phone or electronic means and at parent and teacher conferences.
● Improving skills and knowledge in teaching by regularly taking classes, attending workshops and discovering new methods of delivering exciting content to students.
● Performing other functions as necessary or assigned by Supervisors / Heads of Division.
● Assisting Supervisors / Heads of Division in any projects or tasks in relation to company goals and objectives.
● Participating in all School-wide events.
Job Requirement:
1. Academic Education / Training / Experience
● Degree in related majors from an internationally recognised university.
● Teaching certification from a recognised institution.
● Teaching certification with practicum or teaching experience will be an advantage.
● Competent in Information Technology for use in Teaching and Learning, as well as data analysis
● Strong knowledge in curriculum, pedagogy and assessments.
● Experience in teaching in an international setting is an advantage.
● Minimum 3 years of working experience in education institutions.
● Knowledge of business/Eco using Singapore and/or Cambridge curriculum.
● Experience in teaching in an international setting, as well as managing a department in school, is an advantage.

2. Personal Attributes 
● Strong passion in education with the ability to inspire students
● Willing to be stationed in Phnom Penh, Cambodia
● Willing to work flexibly in dynamic and fast-paced environment
● Excellent interpersonal, communication and presentation skills
● Strong ability in leadership, networking, teamwork, and problem-solving
● Meticulous, analytical and self-driven
● Ability to think strategically
● Ability to work independently, as well as in collaboration with others
● Ability to “think outside the box” in identifying problems and implementing solutions
● Works well under pressure, well organised and with strong attention to details
● Ability to multitask and manage tight deadlines
Company Profile:
Singapore (Cambodia) International Academy (SCIA) endeavours to be the centre of excellence in education and higher learning. SCIA is a member of the Singapore Institute of Management (SIM) Group, the leading provider of a diverse range of education pathways and professional training in Singapore. Recognising the importance of nurturing future leaders in Cambodia, SCIA offers the following programmes to cater to the different needs of learners:
- Early Childhood Education
- Primary Education
- Secondary Education
- Pre-University Education

With the expertise of trained Singapore and international educators, SCIA provides a holistic and rigorous education with a global perspective.

SCIA is a registered school of Cambridge Assessment International Education, and appointed by the Singapore Examinations and Assessment Board (SEAB) as an Overseas Examination Centre to conduct the Singapore International Primary School Examination (iPSLE). SCIA is also appointed by the University of London as the first and only Recognised Teaching Centre in Cambodia to offer the International Foundation Programme (IFP).
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   +855 61 777 808 careers_teaching@scia.edu.kh One Park, Phnom Penh City Center, No.58, Street R8, Sangkat Srah Chak, Khan Doun Penh, Phnom Penh +855 61 777 808

Job Description:
1.Provide technical assistance and support to end-users, including troubleshooting hardware and software issues, resolving network connectivity problems and attending user inquiries.

4.Monitoring and maintaining organization’s computer network infrastructure, including but no limit to configuring, installing and managing network devices such as Switch, Router and etc.
5.Maintenance of printers, servers, network switches, routers, time attendance system and etc.
6.Security measures to protect the organization’s computer systems and data from unauthorized access, including managing antivirus software and windows security update.
7.Assist and involve with annual IT audits and provide recommendation hardware and or software application upgrade.

Job Description: - ត្រូវមើលការខុសត្រូវហាងទាំងមូលទាំងការបញ្ជាទិញទំនិញផងដែរ។- ត្រូវរៀបចំការចម្អិនអាហារឲ្យទៅតាមស្តង់ដារនៃរូបមន្តដែលបានកំណត់។-ត្រូវពន្យល់និងបង្រៀនបុគ្គលិកផ្នែកកូនកាំបិតឲ្យចេះធ្វើម្ហូបផងដែរ។- ត្រូវត្រួតពិនិត្យនិងរៀបចំទំនិញដូចជាបន្លែនិងសាច់ឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវនៅមានអនាម័យល្អ។- ត្រូវបែងចែកនិងត្រួតពិនិត្យការងាររបស់កូនក្រុមឲ្យស្មើភាពគ្នា។- ពេលបិទហាងត្រូវត្រួតពិនិត្យមើលប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវជាពិសេសប្រព័ន្ធហ្គាស។- ឯកសណ្ឋានត្រូវពាក់ឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវនិងមានអនាម័យឲ្យបានសត្វបានជានិច្ចពិសេសក្លិនខ្លួន។- ពេលចម្អិនអាហារត្រូវពាក់មួកការពារសក់ឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវគ្រប់ពេលចម្អិនម្ហូប។-
Job Requirement: - មានបទពិសោធន៍បណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលផ្នែកចុងភៅយ៉ាងតិច 6 ខែ- អាចនិយាយនិងសរសេរភាសាជាតិបាន។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: • In charge and prepare all the mise en place and food item such as meat seafood, vegetables, potatoes, dried store etc. as required for the daily operation of Central kitchen  and every store. • Assist their direct supervisor with consistency and quality of food preparation and presentation to maintain the Central standards.• Give their subordinates sufficient support and guidance to ensure that they can perform in a satisfactory manner.• Observe and learn to operate the variety of kitchen equipment as provided in the respective working area• Take responsibility of the proper storage of vegetable, dried store and meat products.• Attend daily briefings and monthly meeting if required.  • Cleaning and maintaining tools and equipment and ensuring displays and signage are accurate and attractive.• Weighing, packaging, pricing, and displaying products.• Keeping records, budgets, and inventory.• Performing quality inspections on meats and other products.• Negotiating and confirming orders with suppliers.• Adhering to food safety and sanitation controls.• Coordinating deliveries or order pickups.• Checking invoice and PO with supply and receiver. • Checking ordering and inventory of butcher and commissary.
Job Requirement: • Demi chef De-parties’ certificate. • Proven experience as Dime chef butcher. • Outstanding communication and leadership skills.• Up to date with culinary trends and optimized kitchen processes.• Has minimum 1 years of relevant experience as demi chef butcher and commissary in a Hotel/Restaurant or Central kitchen is a plus.• Expertise in butcher (Vegetable, Meat, poultry, seafood).• Food Safety and Hygiene.• Management, Leadership and Communication Skill. • Problem solving and Pressure handling.• Can work in fast pack environment.

Job Description:
•	Draft and review all kinds of contracts for the company’s operations.
•	Prepare, review and modify contractual instruments and legal templates to assist and support a variety of commercial activities.
•	Monitor all the contracts to ensure that the rights and obligations of the company are protected and consistent with the company's policies.
•	Regularly monitor and provide legal advice and legal analysis related to the company’s businesses to ensure compliance with laws and regulations.
•	Provide internal support and assistance for any legal documents, legal concerns and other documents request by the tenants, customers and government.
•	Conduct research on upcoming/new laws and regulations.
•	Other duties are delegated by Supervisor.
Job Requirement:
•	Education: Bachelor’s degree in law
•	Experience: minimum of 1 year-experience.
•	Knowledge: understanding in commercial and business laws.
•	Skills: Proficiency in both English writing and speaking.
•	Good Computer Skills (Words, Excel, Powerpoint).
•	Be Able to Work with Shift Schedule (including weekends and holidays).
Company Profile:
AEON MALL is the Japan’s Largest Specialist Shopping Mall Developer. We not only develop but also operate over 150 shopping malls throughout Japan and other countries. On expanding retail business across Asia, AEON MALL has opened our third biggest shopping mall in 2022.

អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្នែកហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ / Financial benefits:
- ធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់24ម៉ោង /​ Private 24/7 accident insurance after probation.
- សេវាធានារ៉ាប់រង បសស NSSF (Work related injury and health care)
- ប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្តពីរដងក្នុងមួយឆ្នាំ / Bonus Twice per year
- ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភថ្លៃសាំង / Gasoline Allowance
- ការដំឡើងប្រាក់ខែប្រចាំឆ្នាំ / Annual Salary Increment
- ប្រាក់ថែមម៉ោង / Overtime
- ប្រាក់អតីតភាពការងារ / Seniority Payment
- ប្រាក់បំណាច់បញ្ចប់កិច្ចសន្យា / Severance Payment
- ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភចូលរួមរំលែកទុក្ខពេលមានមរណភាព /Mourning Allowance
- ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភពេលសម្រាលកូន/ Maternity Allowance

អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗក្រៅពីហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ / Non- Financial benefits:
- ការឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំខែ ៨-៩ថ្ងៃក្នុង១ខែ / 8-9 days Off per month
- អាហារមួយពេលក្នុង០១ថ្ងៃធ្វើការ / 01 meal per working day
- ច្បាប់សម្រាកពិសេស / Special Leave
- ការឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ១៨ថ្ងៃក្នុង ១ឆ្នាំ / Annual Leave
- ការឈប់សម្រាកមាតុភាព / Maternity Leave
- ការឈប់សម្រាកសម្រាប់បុគ្គលិកបុរសពេលភរិយាសម្រាលបុត្រ / Paternity Leave
- ការឈប់សម្រាកពេលរៀបអាពាពិពាហ៏/ Marriage Leave
- ការឈប់សម្រាកឈឺពេលខ្លី និងឈឺពេលវែង / Short term and long term Sick leave
- ការលើកទឹកចិត្តសម្រាប់បុគ្គលិកដែលមានអតីតភាពការងារវែង ៥ឆ្នាំ ១០ឆ្នាំ .... / Long Year Service Award (5 years, 10 years,…)

ផ្សេងៗ / Others:
- ដំណើរកំសាន្តប្រចាំឆ្នាំសម្រាប់បុគ្គលិក / Annual Staff Trip
- ការជប់លៀងចុងឆ្នាំ / Year End Party
- ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ / Career Development Opportunity
- ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលក្នុង និងក្រៅប្រទេស / Local and Oversea Training

job title: Senior Officer, IT Digital Channel Support
position: Senior Officer, IT Digital Channel Support
Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment and Job Management  092 333 020 / 070 700 123 jobs@amret.com.kh #80, Street 315, Sangkat Boeung Kak2, Khan Toul Kok, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 092 333 020 / 070 700 123

Job Description:
1.	To translate job order from JP to KH, translate documents from JP to KH that requested by Japan HQ.
2.	To translate trainees’ family book, candidate’s CV etc from KH to JP
3.	To prepare draft of job announcement 
4.	To contact, follow up with Marketing team for design job announcement. 
5.	To call, reply, answer comment and chat on Facebook.
6.	To recruit trainee for interview
7.	To prepare for a written test and physical test before interview.
8.	To prepare and take self-introduce video before interview.
9.	To train Japanese and explain about Japan’s company to candidate before interview.
10.	To support VISA’s document preparation and bring to submit at Japan Embassy
11.	To prepare “Lump-sum Withdrawal Payment (Pension Salary)” document, to follow up with Japan HQ after submit document until get payment.
12.	To be translator in interview meeting
13.	To find a place for trainees go to intern.
14.	To contact, follow up with internship company to get contract, invoice, certificate. 
15.	To contact to airline agency to ask price of air ticket.
16.	To Provide basic job information to those interested in phone call, reply comment and chat on Facebook.
17.	To send sample trainee about self-introduction 
18.	Other tasks are assigned by the manager.
Job Requirement: -	Able to speak Japanese N3 level-	Able to speak in English at a Good-	Computer skill (Word, Excel, internet and email-	Good at calculation, good at time management, and logical thinking-	Able to work in JCIA (Japan Cambodia Interactive Association) -	No experience can apply.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  098 471 333/085 888 420 recruitment@renet.com.kh #425,ជាន់,ផ្លូវ 271,សង្កាត់បឹងទំពុន​1,ខណ្ឌមានជ័យ,រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ 098 471 333/085 888 420

Job Description:
**The GIZ, Improving Social Protection and Health project, output 5, aims to improve laboratory capacities in the health sector for quality-assured diagnostics. One work package of activities supports 12 laboratory sites in Cambodia to strengthen the implementation of Quality Management Systems (QMS). Amongst the 12 sites, there is a wide range of capacities. For QMS implementation, various mentoring activities (on-site mentoring, virtual training and in-person workshops) contribute to success. In addition, QMS sustainability is more likely if we institutionalize a mentoring program. 
Thus, the management 4 health (m4h) and Integrated Quality Laboratory Services (IQLS) consortium, implementing this laboratory strengthening project, is recruiting an Assistant Laboratory mentor:
- To assist in a wide range of activities required to support the in-country m4h IQLS team.
- To support laboratory activities at the 12 QMS implementation sites.
- To support the logistic efforts required to implement the agreed work plan including QMS mentor workshops, regional on-site mentoring workshops and onsite mentoring.

**Tasks of the Assistant laboratory mentor 
Based on the established need to recruit an additional team member to support the m4h IQLS team, the Assistant laboratory mentor will have the following tasks:
- Support logistics for the QMS workshops, regional on-site mentoring workshops, and the on-site mentoring
- Support QMS mentors with regional/on-site mentoring to implement QMS at 12 sites.
- Support the development of QMS training materials.
- Assist, if required, with monitoring and reporting activities
- Other tasks as assigned by the supervisor.
Job Requirement:
**Qualification requirements for the Assistant laboratory mentor position
Recruitment for this position will be open following the staff selection process of m4h in accordance with GIZ procedures. A documentation of the selection will be submitted to GIZ ISPH with the recommended candidate for approval. The qualification requirements for this position are the following:

- Education/training: Bachelor’s in medical laboratory technology or equivalent 
- Languages: Knowledge of English (B1) in the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages; and Fluency in Khmer
- Understanding of the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) requirements for Quality Management Systems
- Professional experience: 3-5 years of experience working in a clinical medical laboratory.
- Specific professional experience: at least 12 months of experience in implementing Laboratory Quality Management Systems


**Applicants should answer to the Qualification requirements in a cover letter and submit along with CV and names and contact details for two referees, by the 24th of August 5pm.
Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
Contact Info: Contact Information MS. Som Solida  089 666 015 som@iqls.net National Institute of Public Health 089 666 015

position: Operations Manager of Alex Quach Auto Shop (ប្រធានប្រត្តិបត្តិគ្រប់គ្រង យានដ្ឋាន អាឡិច គួច)
Job Description:
• Oversee daily operations, remedy customer complains promptly, and ensure customer satisfaction metric and met.
• Recruit, hire, and train subordinate staff to ensure each department is qualify to meet profit levels.
• Assist with the creation of affordable advertising campaigns and program to increase sale and brand visibility for the car dealership.
• Attend head of each department meeting and establish good working relationship both internal and car owner.
• To understanding our Vision and Mission and car owner needs and develop plans to address them.
• Ensure the auto shop service team attends to all customer complaints and requirement which to be notice.
• Resolve all people and safety issues in timely and effective manner, collaborating with relevant department and appropriate teams effectively.
• Confer with customers to obtain descriptions of vehicle problems and discuss work to be performed.
• Estimated costs and time required for repair or maintenance of the vehicle.
• Plan, organize and coordinate the day-to-day running of garage, e.g., by writing work orders and by arranging for garage staff to perform necessary maintenance and repair work on vehicle.
• Repair, maintain and service vehicles and their mechanical and electronic components.
• Ensure that necessary spare parts, materials and equipment are available or obtainable at short notice.
• Check the activities in the garage, inspect completed work for compliance with safety and other statutory regulations, and make sure defects are repaired or adjusted.
• Maintain records of repair and service work, and make reports to detect recurrent faults.
• Make sure the vehicle is returned to the owner in a clean and decent state.
• Provide information for staff about latest development, technical specification of new cars, garage merchandise, etc.

Quach Education PLC, MJQ Jobs, Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Read and publicize all official memo(s) to students, attend all meetings and orientation at the beginning and/or throughout the term (meetings and orientation are mandatory).
• Teach Literacy and numeracy along with personal, social and emotional skills.
• Employ a variety of instructional techniques and teaching strategies to meet different aptitudes and interests of students, including whole group/ small group or individual learning.
• Follow course syllabus provided by Aii Language Center.
• Help with the integration of technology into the classroom, helping set up computers and projectors, for example.
• Be well planned for her/ his class. Design and follow a complete teaching plan.
• Initiate, plan, organize, and participate in activities, including extracurricular activities, training, and workshops (extracurricular activity is mandatory if required).
• Work in collaboration with Aii Language Center management team.
• Assist in developing a curriculum that takes an overall approach to English/Chinese study and focus on a specific aspect of language use.
• Teach students English/Chinese skills, such as listening, reading, writing and speaking.
• Establish and maintain communication between parents of students and the school in the program.
• Engage parents and families in their student’s learning and acting as an ambassador for the school in the community.
• Contribute productively to the school as a whole.
• Write student report cards using the online continuous assessment with their overall performance.
• Organize learning materials and resources.
• Use a variety of activities and instructional methods.
• Assess student’s performance and progress to ensure they are mastering the skills on regular basis.
• Monitor children’s interactions and nurture cooperation and sharing.
• Follow and comply with teaching standards.
• Establish and enforce rules for behavior, and procedures for maintaining order.
• Adapt teaching methods and instructional materials to meet students’ varying needs and interests.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor degree in Education or equivalent
• Master degree is a plus
• Excellent problem-solving skills, and able to use initiative
• Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views
• Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks
• An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude
• Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media
• Ability to employ technology
• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English
• Strong administrative and organizational skills

•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
