company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Read and publicize all official memo(s) to students, attend all meetings and orientation at the beginning and/or throughout the term (meetings and orientation are mandatory).
• Teach Literacy and numeracy along with personal, social and emotional skills.
• Employ a variety of instructional techniques and teaching strategies to meet different aptitudes and interests of students, including whole group/ small group or individual learning.
• Follow course syllabus provided by Aii Language Center.
• Help with the integration of technology into the classroom, helping set up computers and projectors, for example.
• Be well planned for her/ his class. Design and follow a complete teaching plan.
• Initiate, plan, organize, and participate in activities, including extracurricular activities, training, and workshops (extracurricular activity is mandatory if required).
• Work in collaboration with Aii Language Center management team.
• Assist in developing a curriculum that takes an overall approach to English/Chinese study and focus on a specific aspect of language use.
• Teach students English/Chinese skills, such as listening, reading, writing and speaking.
• Establish and maintain communication between parents of students and the school in the program.
• Engage parents and families in their student’s learning and acting as an ambassador for the school in the community.
• Contribute productively to the school as a whole.
• Write student report cards using the online continuous assessment with their overall performance.
• Organize learning materials and resources.
• Use a variety of activities and instructional methods.
• Assess student’s performance and progress to ensure they are mastering the skills on regular basis.
• Monitor children’s interactions and nurture cooperation and sharing.
• Follow and comply with teaching standards.
• Establish and enforce rules for behavior, and procedures for maintaining order.
• Adapt teaching methods and instructional materials to meet students’ varying needs and interests.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor degree in Education or equivalent
• Master degree is a plus
• Excellent problem-solving skills, and able to use initiative
• Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views
• Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks
• An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude
• Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media
• Ability to employ technology
• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English
• Strong administrative and organizational skills

**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖
•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ
•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ

សូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព 4x6។
បេក្ខជន បេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់អាចមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំធ្វើការនៅអគារលេខ223 និង227, មហាវិថីម៉ៅសេទុង ឬតាមរយៈអ៊ីមែល: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, Website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh, www.mjqjobs.com, Mengly J. Quach Education PLC, MJQ Jobs, Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 61 700 181
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
- Verify supporting invoices with support documents such as PR, PO, Contract & Company policies
- Issue invoices / Debit Note to customers
- Issue Receipt Slip while receive money from customers
- Record Transactions of purchase invoices & Sale invoice to system
- Separate Freight charge by purchase invoices & Sale invoice
- Forecast Cash flow and balance control
- Cash out to suppliers by Cash, Cheque & Bank Transfer
- Recognize accrual transactions & record to system
- Prepare Monthly tax payment & Monthly tax declarations
- Control Account payable balance by suppliers & Reconciliation Account Payable
- Control Account receivable balance by customers & Reconciliation Account Receivable
- Account Reconciliation
- Control movement of inventory in-out & adjustment
- Conduction physical inventory count both warehouse & production
- Reconcile inventory
- Update Fixed asset & calculate monthly fixed asset depreciation
- Fixed asset controlling
- To perform other assigned jobs
- Other Tasks assign by Manager
Job Requirement:
- Age: 20 ~ 30
- Sex: Male or Female
- Education: Bachelor degree of Accounting, Finance or other relevant fields
- Experience: At least 2 year experience in accounting field (prefer in manufacturing)
- Primary mathematics ability

- Can use English for communication
- Can use MS Office (MS Word, MS Excel, MS PowerPoint) fluently
- Open mind & team work mind
- Strong commitment and stick to deadline (schedule controlling)
- Friendliness toward all employees

Job Description:

- Coordinate a regular meeting with safety team to review issues, trends and upcoming conditions
or events.
- Ensure that all incidents are reported immediately.
- Repair and maintenance company facility equipment.
- Follow and facilitate maintenance work.
- Conduct and report daily check (Daily Maintenance Check List, PM Check List)
- Calibrate and confirm individual and sharing tools.
- Prepare machine records.
- Follow direction from supervisor.
- Conduct assigned work.
- Follow company code of practice and company regulation.
- Work in the way, which minimize the impacts to environment, and keep safety.

- Education: Bachelor degree in Electric, Mechanic, or Electronic Engineer.

- Be respectful  
- Possess cultural awareness and sensitivity  
- Be flexible

- Be punctual  
- Able training at oversea and work at night shift  
- Primary mathematics ability  
- Basic PC skill (Excel, word, Power Point)

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Read and publicize all official memo(s) to students, attend all meetings and orientation at the beginning and/or throughout the term (meetings and orientation are mandatory).
• Teach Literacy and numeracy along with personal, social and emotional skills.
• Employ a variety of instructional techniques and teaching strategies to meet different aptitudes and interests of students, including whole group/ small group or individual learning.
• Follow course syllabus provided by Aii Language Center.
• Help with the integration of technology into the classroom, helping set up computers and projectors, for example.
• Be well planned for her/ his class. Design and follow a complete teaching plan.
• Initiate, plan, organize, and participate in activities, including extracurricular activities, training, and workshops (extracurricular activity is mandatory if required).
• Work in collaboration with Aii Language Center management team.
• Assist in developing a curriculum that takes an overall approach to English/Chinese study and focus on a specific aspect of language use.
• Teach students English/Chinese skills, such as listening, reading, writing and speaking.
• Establish and maintain communication between parents of students and the school in the program.
• Engage parents and families in their student’s learning and acting as an ambassador for the school in the community.
• Contribute productively to the school as a whole.
• Write student report cards using the online continuous assessment with their overall performance.
• Organize learning materials and resources.
• Use a variety of activities and instructional methods.
• Assess student’s performance and progress to ensure they are mastering the skills on regular basis.
• Monitor children’s interactions and nurture cooperation and sharing.
• Follow and comply with teaching standards.
• Establish and enforce rules for behavior, and procedures for maintaining order.
• Adapt teaching methods and instructional materials to meet students’ varying needs and interests.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor degree in Education or equivalent• If ESL Teacher doesn’t have a degree in Bachelor of education, s/he is required to have TESOL, CELTA, TEFL Certificate.• Excellent problem-solving skills, and able to use initiative• Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views• Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks• An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude• Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media• Ability to employ technology• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English• Strong administrative and organizational skills**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារសូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព 4x6។បេក្ខជន បេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់អាចមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំធ្វើការនៅអគារលេខ223 និង227, មហាវិថីម៉ៅសេទុង ឬតាមរយៈអ៊ីមែល: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, Website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh, www.mjqjobs.com, Mengly J. **អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖
•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ
•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ

Job Description:
• Read and publicize all official memo(s) to students, attend all meetings and orientation at the beginning and/or throughout the term (meetings and orientation are mandatory).
• Assist a teacher and reinforce the instruction taught in the classroom to students.
• Supervise the students outside of the classroom at the playground, during bathroom breaks, and on field trips or study tours.
• When class is not in session, a teacher aide might assist other tasks assigned by the school.
• Organize the classroom and put supplies in order.
• Initiate, plan, organize, and participate in activities, including extracurricular activities, training, and workshops (extracurricular activity is mandatory if required).
• Work in collaboration with Aii Language Center management team.
• Assist in developing a curriculum that takes an overall approach to English study and focus on a specific aspect of language use.
• Establish and maintain communication between parents of students and the school in the program.
• Engage parents and families in their student’s learning and acting as an ambassador for the school in the community.
• Contribute productively to the school as a whole.
• And other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor degree in Education
• Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative
• Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views
• Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks
• An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude
• Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media
• Ability to understand and keep within a budget
• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English
• Strong administrative and organizational skills

*How to apply:

1. Submit your CV and Cover Letter with a 4x6 Current Photo to our email: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh. Please be noted that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description: - Occasional work that may extend beyond the normal workday- Occasional operation of a vehicle under inclement weather conditions – Occasional interaction among unruly children/adults- Many situations that require hand motion, e.g., computer keyboard, typing, writing- Consistent requirements to sit, stand, walk, hear, see, read, speak, reach, stretch with hands and arms, crouch, kneel, climb and stoop- Consistent requirements to lift, carry, push, and pull various supplies and/or equipment up to a maximum of 25 kilos or more DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES- Directs the effective delivery and continuous improvement of business services of the MJQE Business Units- Develops maintenance and facilities goals and strategies to accomplish approved objectives within specified time lines- Develops short and long-range facility use plans; supervises new construction and renovation projects; ensures compliance with building codes and Disability accessibility standards- Schedules meetings with classified maintenance, custodial, grounds, food service, infrastructure technology, campuses-wide security, and other staff as needed; maintains effective communications to resolve problems and sustain progress- Prepares MJQE in meeting relevant ministries safety regulations/requirements- Works collaboratively with transportation department in assessing effective delivery of services- Participates as an active member of the MJQE Senior Management team- Co-reviewer of master facility plan with building owners (school presidents and school campus owners)- Assist in the development and coordination of the sections of the budget that pertain to custodial (In-house and Janitors), maintenance, infrastructure technology and food service personnel; reviews and analyzes composition and costs of the labor force- Confers with Presidents, Directors, Head Principals and relevant party heads to determine building needs based on budget variables and parameters; uses auditing processes to analyze structure and costs in relationship to conditions of the MJQE finances and local economy- Confers with Presidents, Directors, Head Principals and relevant party heads to determine building/facility needs based on variables such as, but not limited to, enrollment; budget parameters; students and staff needs; uses auditing processes to analyze building and facility costs- Manages cost-control/energy savings and/or other programs; prepares revenue and expense projections for school facilities (e.g., rental revenues/agreements/etc.)- Administers Board of Trustees and Senior Managements approved permanent improvement budget- Prepares competitive bid and quotes specifications, contracts with MJQE- Recommends and monitors performance of contractors/vendors with Procurement and relevant parties involved- Assist finance team with the management of the MJQE’s non-consumable asset- Manages non-school use of MJQE facilities (e.g., rental, scheduling, set-up, etc.)- Oversees effective maintenance and custodial services- Serves as the MJQE liaison to governmental regulatory agencies and monitors compliance with safety regulations and environmental laws- Work with insurance company on risk assessment- Periodically visits buildings at night to monitor custodial staff- Collaborates with maintenance, SPSD, and relevant department heads and to ensure building inspections are periodically completed and informs campus owners of results Performs building inspections with staff and informs principles of results- Works with all required teams on safety inspections- Administers employment testing procedures for classified applications; manages classified staff selection and orientation processes (Operational staff)
Job Requirement: 1. A Bachelor’s Degree or higher in business administration education or accounting preferred2. Experiences as an Operations Director or higher or experience within a school/college operations office preferred3. And/or Any additional qualifications, training or other credentials, as determined by the Senior ManagementsREQUIRED SKILLS AND ABILITIES1. Communication Skills: Must be able to read, analyze, and interpret information relevant to the position, including being able to speak effectively to small and large groups of people, and to communicate clearly and concisely both orally and in writing.2. Leadership Ability: Must be able to articulate the vision and mission for the company and provide appropriate direction, guidance, and management skills to achieve them.3. Mathematics Skills: Must have the ability to work with basic mathematical and computational concepts4. Reasoning Ability: Must be able to define problems, collect data, establish facts, and draw valid conclusions5. Technology Skills: Able to effectively use, as it applies to your specific job function, typical office applications and computer programs such as word processing, spreadsheets, and presentations; must be able to use email.PERSONAL QUALIFICATIONS1. Demonstrates enthusiasm and a sincere desire to aid and ensure the safety (SPSD & CCTV) of all2. Is able to accept constructive criticism/feedback3. Demonstrates professional tact and diplomacy with administrators, staff, teachers, students, parents and the diverse community4. Is conscientious and assumes responsibility for one’s own work performance5. Anticipates problems and unforeseen events and deals with them in an appropriate manner6. Demonstrates an ability to make the proper decisions when required7. Demonstrates loyalty to the administrative team8. Possesses high moral character and a good attendance record9. Promotes good social relationships as well as promoting good public relations by personal appearance, attitude and conversation10. Participates in appropriate professional organizations and their activities.11. Maintains a calm attitude and sense of control at all times12. Maintains a high level of ethical behavior and confidentiality of information.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Company Profile: The Australian Centre for Education (ACE) is leader in the provision of English language teaching and international education services in Cambodia and the South East Asia region. Currently, ACE operates on four campuses in Phnom Penh and one campus in Siem Reap. ACE is an initiative of IDP Education, a world leader in international education and student placement services. IDP is part-owned by 38 Australian universities and is also a co-owner of the International English Language Testing System (IELTS). For more info about ACE or IDP: www.acecambodia.org or www.idp.com/cambodia

IDP is part-owned by 38 Australian universities and is also a co-owner of the International English Language Testing System (IELTS). - Expanding business with various existing and new modern trade channel;
- Convince the shop that do not have retail outlet for dispensing spectacles in order to start doing the same.
- Sales and distribution of spectacles, optical equipment and consumables.

- Minimum with exposure to sales and distribution, key account management

- Basic knowledge of computer usage is mandatory
- Good in English both written and spoken

Company Profile:
The Essilor Group has put its expertise at the service of good vision in designing, manufacturing and distributing quality products and services through innovative business models. Today we provide solutions to correct and protect the visual health of the 7.4 billion people in the world.

To achieve this ambition, we place our mission of improving lives by improving sight at the heart of everything we do, respecting the values and principles that have shaped the Group for near 170 years. Our mission unites our 67,000 employees across the world, drives our strategy, stimulates innovation and guides

our commitments to each of our stakeholders. Essilor group has a wide variety of job areas and functions: sales, marketing, R&D, engineering, operations, production or instruments and equipment as well as finance, HR, information systems… With a fast-growing global presence in its historical lenses activity, but also in new markets with their own specific business roles – sunwear, reading glasses, photochromic lenses and online sales – the company offers a multitude of career paths, often international, that will develop your skills and grow you permanently.

To support our growth, we’re recruiting new team members with a variety of skills and complementary talents… Why not you?

Read more on https://www.essilor.com/

Job Description: •Ensure that the department service exceeds passenger's expectations and that a positive atmosphere is maintained throughout the House keeping department.•Distributing the workload amongst the other departments, outside catering Service.•Responsible for the proper early morning preparation on the Observation deck and Gym.•Maintains a good working relationship with any other department on board the vessel.•Ensures proper requisition according to the set budgets within the department.•Evaluates all crew reporting to Hotel Manager (Mid evaluations, Final evaluations and warnings).•Ensures proper inventories and send every end of the cruise to the Head office and Hotel Manager.•Responsible that all special requests are carried out in a timely manner and that the proper lead time for the passenger’s requirement.•Ensures a proper training and cleaning plan which is carried out in conjunction with all HODs.•In charge of daily HK crew schedule and assignments in cooperation with the all HODs and making final approval.•Ensuring general maintenance and repairs for relate all outlets area.•Need to conduct minimum 3 general meetings with whole HK team brigade in period of each cruise.     •To Check and record lost & found items ( follow by procedure) •Maintains strictly Key control at entrance in accordance with passenger’s every excursion departures and arrivals. •Be familiar with Emergency procedures of the ship.•Overall supervision of Public Health in all Cabins & Public areas.•Maintains and oversees the working hours schedule for the department. •Verifying check in rooms (follow by procedure) Reviewing check out room ( Phnom Penh day Check IN / OUT)•To monitor Works Schedule and work force assigned to shift to ensure all section/area are adequately covered and proper written hand over.•Responsible for seeing that the staff receives the necessary training for the efficient execution of their duties on daily basis if needed. •To communicate with other relate department and share update information of the passengers.•Integrated pest Management logs and supervision.•Endure all equipment and works areas are kept clean/clear of any safety hazards•Must be able to work efficiently within a team environment.•Must be able to work effectively in stressful, high-pressure situations.•Must have strong customer service skills. Ability to deal with problems involving guests and operational issues while maintaining a positive attitude.
Job Requirement: •Possess a diploma from a recognised hotel school or university, plus a minimum of three years serving in a supervisory position on-board a vessel.  Alternatively, a minimum of two years’ experience in House keeping supervision on board.•Have exposure to basic budgeting techniques and financial analysis.•Speak English fluently.  Proficiency in one other language would be an advantage.•Ability to plan, executes, follow up and be positive to change in a very flexible working environment.•Friendly, outgoing, well presented personality.•Ability to train and motivate with good public speaking skills.•Ability to innovate and foster creativity.•PC knowledge of: Word, MXP, Excel.•Fluent in interpreting and implementing companies and work rules.•Effective planner and organizer•Strong team building abilities.

Job Description:
 Work closely with Branch Managers and Regional Managers on staff retention, staff engagement, disciplinary action and transfer processes.
 Facilitate and provide consultation in promotion, demotion, transfer, career rotation, career mapping and staff recognition in order to ensure the fairness and alignment with internal guidelines.
 Implement succession planning, and talent management processes ensuring accuracy and consistency of information with fair and efficiency.
 Oversee the implementation of code of conduct, corporate culture and value.
 Deal with retention intervention and conduct exit interview when required.
 Conduct employee engagement to understand about staff feeling, career interest, and business challenges and performance.
 Offering counseling services to employees.
 Liaising between employees and management.
 Managing employee complaints.
 Manages and resolves complex employee relations issues. Conducts effective, thorough and objective investigations.
 Analyze information and feedback regarding to people or business issues and work with
concern management to find proper solutions.
 Oversee market change related to benefit and business status and update to Head of HR.
 Other tasks assigned by Head of HR.
Job Requirement:
 Degree in HRM, management, business administration or related field.
 Knowledge in HRBP, Performance Management, Talent Management, and Succession planning.
 Minimum 03-year experiences in HR functions.
 Good staff motivation, engagement and leadership skills.
 Ability to work in complex working environment and change management.
 Computer Literacy.
 Can travel to branches.
 Good verbal and written communication both Khmer and English.

job title: មន្ត្រីផ្នែកលក់ប្រាក់បញ្ញើ-សន្សំ (Relationship Supervisor)
position: មន្ត្រីផ្នែកលក់ប្រាក់បញ្ញើ-សន្សំ (Relationship Supervisor)
Job Description:
សាខា៖ ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ(០១), ខេត្តរតនគីរី (០១), ខេត្តពោធិ៍សាត់(០១), ខេត្តព្រៃវែង(០១), ស្រុកកៀនស្វាយ(០១)
និងសាខាស្រុកបាទី-ឃុំសូរភី (០១)​​

ក. ភារកិច្ច និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវ៖
- បង្កើត និងអភិវឌ្ឍយុទ្ធសាស្ត្រលក់ នៃប្រាក់បញ្ញើ ATM Card iPay User Merchant និងសេវាហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ដើម្បីសម្រេចបាននូវគោលដៅអាជីវកម្ម និងធានាបាននូវ ការបំពេញតម្រូវការរបស់អតិថិជន។
- គាំទ្រគ្រប់ភាគីពាក់ព័ន្ធ និងសាខា ដើម្បីធានានូវផែនការប្រាក់បញ្ញើ ATM Card និងសេវាហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សម្រេចបានតាមគោលដៅ។
- រៀបចំផែនការប្រមូលប្រាក់បញ្ញើ ATM Card និងសេវាហិរញ្ញវត្ថុរៀងជារៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃ ប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធិភាពខ្ពស់ និងសម្រេចបាននូវគោលដៅរបស់ អិលអូអិលស៊ី។
- យល់អំពីអតិថិជនសក្ដានុពល ទីផ្សារ និងតម្រូវការចាំបាច់ ដើម្បីធ្វើផែនការសកម្មភាពចូលទីផ្សារថ្មី ប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធិភាព      ខ្ពស់។
- ចុះជួបអតិថិជនតាមទីផ្សារ និងបញ្ចុះបញ្ចូលដាក់ប្រាក់បញ្ញើ ប្រើប្រាស់កាតអេធីអឹម និងណែនាំ អំពីផលិតផលថ្មី របស់               អិលអូអិលស៊ី។
- រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍សរ៉ុបសង្ខេប ដែលបានទំនាក់ទំនងប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំខែ ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ហើយធៀបនិងផែនការជាក់ស្តែង និងស្វែងរកនូវចំណុចខ្សោយដែលកំពុងប្រឈម និងដំដោះស្រាយឱ្យទាន់ពេល។
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យមើលនូវស្ថានភាពធ្លាក់ចុះនៃការលក់ ប្រាក់បញ្ញើ និងសេវាហិរញ្ញវត្ថុផ្សេងៗទៀតដែលអាចកើតមានឡើង និងរកដំណោះស្រាយ។
- យល់ពីចំណុចខ្សោយនៃផលិតផលប្រាក់បញ្ញើ និងសេវាហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ដើម្បីធ្វើការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ និងអតិថិជនពេញចិត្តកាន់តែខ្លាំង។
- រក្សាទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអតិថិជន ប្រកបដោយភាពរួសរាយ រាក់ទាក់ ស្របតាមគោលការណ៍របស់អិលអូអិលស៊ី ជាពិសេស បង្កើនការទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយបុគ្គលិក អិលអូអិលស៊ី ទាំងអស់។

សាខា៖   ខណ្ឌទួលគោក (០១) ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ(០១), សាខាខណ្ឌ៧មករា (០២), សាខាក្រុងបាត់ដំបង (០១), ខេត្តតាកែវ(០១),
             ខេត្តកំពង់ស្ពឺ (០១), ខេត្តកំពង់ឆ្នាំង(0១), សាខាស្រុកបាទី (០១) និងសាខាស្រុកបារាយណ៍(០១)
Job Requirement:
- មានបរិញ្ញាបត្រក្នុងផ្នែកហរិញ្ញវត្ថុ និងធនាគារ ការគ្រប់គ្រង ទីផ្សារ និងសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ
- បទពិសោធន៍ផ្នែកលក់ប្រាក់បញ្ញើ-សន្សំ និងផលិតផល និងសេវាឌីជីថលកាន់តែល្អ។
- មានជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនង និងសរសេរភាសារអង់គ្លេសបានល្អ។
- មានការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់ និងមានភាពស្មោះត្រង់។
- ជាមនុស្សដែលមានលទ្ធផលការងារល្អ។

Job Description:
- Assis Business Unit Manager to train/support business officer on how to perform their job well.
- Assist Business Unit Manager to analyze and monitor branch performance and staff productivity.

Job Description:
- Control all asset in company
- All work that connect with Ministry
- Make all form that use in company

• Supporting the development and implementation of HR initiatives and systems
• Providing counseling on policies and procedures
• Being actively involved in recruitment by preparing job descriptions, posting ads and managing the hiring process

Job Requirement:
- Salary : $ 300.00 ~ $ 600.00
- Experience: 3 ~ 4 years at least
- Language: English or Korean (Prefer to Speak)
* Interview:
- Excel Test : Basic Excel Skill
- English Test : General knowledge
- Oral interview: Experience Interview

* អត្ថប្រយោជន៍:
- ប្រាក់បន្ថែម៖ ៣ដង/១​ឆ្នាំ ,ចូលឆ្នាំខ្មែរ, ភ្ជុំបិណ្ឌ និងBonusesចុងឆ្នាំ
(Bonuses 3 times per year such as: khmer new year, Pchum Ben & End Year Bonus)

- ​ការឈប់សំរាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ (Annual Leave)
- ផ្តល់ជូនធានារ៉ាបរង Insurance
-​​ ផ្តល់អាហារថ្ងៃត្រង់ Lunch Allowance

* Working Hours
- Mon~Fri : 7:50 Am to 5:00 Pm
- Sat     : 7:50 Am to 3:00 Pm

Job Description:
- Understand customer needs and requirements to develop effective quality control processes.
- Devise and review specifications for products or processes.
- Developing and implementing quality control procedures and policies.
- Ensure quality standards for ski gloves.
- Monitoring and analyzing quality performance data.
- Identifying areas for improvement and implementing corrective actions to address quality matters.
- Inspect final output and compare properties to requirements.
- Supervise inspectors, technicians and other staff and provide guidance and feedback.
- Approve the right products or reject defectives.
- Keep accurate documentation and perform statistical analysis.
- Follow all relevant departmental policies, processes, standard operating procedures, and instructions so that work is carried out in a controlled and consistent manner.
- Assist in the development, implementation and maintenance of improved department specific processes, policies, and procedures.
- A keen eye for detail and a result driven approach.
- Be on the lookout for opportunities for improvement and develop new efficient procedures.
- Proven experience as quality manager
- Conscientious and responsible
Job Requirement:
- Cambodia (Male/ Female)
- Able to communicate in English. 
- At least 5 years experienced and proper to ski gloves experienced.
- Excellent organizational and leadership skills.
- Proficient in MS Office
- Commitment to work long term honesty, and dedication to work hard.
- Good communication skills, positive working attitude, and good team player.
- Fast learner with the ability to solve complications things. 
- Depth understanding of quality control procedures and able to perform under pressure.
- Able to work Monday to Saturday.

** Interested candidates please send CV to:
hr1.kh@hestracambodia.com.kh

position: ជាងម៉ាស៊ីនដេរ ជាងជុសជុសម៉ាស៊ីន ជាងភ្លើងសម្រាប់រោងចក្រស្រោមដៃកីឡា $450-$500
Job Description:
- Sews materials of gloves by computer machine/or sewing machine, to join, gather, reinforce, or decorate materials or fabricated articles.
- Cuts materials, according to specifications, or cuts excess material or thread from finished product, using blade, scissors, or electric knife.
- Examines and measures finished articles to verify conformance to standards.
- Folds or fits together materials to prepare for machine sewing or hand sewing.
- Monitors machine operation to detect problems, such as defective stitching, breaks in thread, or machine malfunction.
- Mounts attachments, such as needles, and adjusts machine guides according to specifications.
- Places spools of thread, cord, or other materials on spindles, inserts bobbin, and threads ends through machine guides and components.
- Positions and marks patterns on materials to prepare for sewing.
- Positions materials through feed rollers and guides, or positions and maneuvers under sewing machine presser foot and needle during operation.
- Records number of materials processed in production logs.
- Removes finished materials from sewing machine.
- Replaces needle and cleans/oils sewing machines to maintain equipment.
- Responsible for the quality and accuracy of the product fabrication according to the fabrication instructions and/or drawing.
- Uses specialized automatic or semi-automatic sewing equipment and other equipment as required to fabricate products.
- Able to Clean air conditioner.
- Set up and maintenance on cutting machine.
- Be able to repair computer sewing machine.
- Electricity skill for factory 
- Fixing table windows, toilets, painting 
- Other Task assign by manager
Job Requirement:
- Cambodia Male
- Electronic Technician Certificate and Sewing machine technician Certificate.
- Able to communicate in Khmer and English. 
- At least 2years experienced and proper to ski gloves experienced.
- Excellent organizational and leadership skills.
- Proficient in repairing sewing machine, cutting machine and electricity. 
- Commitment to work long term honesty, and dedication to work hard.
- Good communication skills, positive working attitude, and good team player.
- Fast learner with the ability to solve complications things. 
- Depth understanding of quality control procedures and able to perform under pressure.
- Able to work Monday to Saturday

** Interested candidates please send CV to:
hr1.kh@hestracambodia.com.kh

Job Description: * We Focuses on food development and research, such as ramen(noodle), ramen soup, tteokbokki(SPICY RICE CAKES), and sauce etc.- Performs analyses on ingredients and food products- Develops product, process and packaging specifications for food products.- Studies methods to improve quality of foods such as flavor, color, texture, nutritional value, or physical, chemical, and microbiological composition of foods.- Food scientists and technologists use chemistry, biology, and other sciences to study the basic elements of food.- Discover new food sources, and research ways to make processed foods safe and healthy.

company_name: SMALL AND MEDIUM ENTERPRISE BANK OF CAMBODIA (SME)
Job Description: ** JOB OVERVIEW- Supervise and coordinate IT senior auditors to execute audit programs. Monitor and perform the preliminary audit analysis and participate in developing audit procedures and audit tools.- Assist the Head of IA in the formula, set up, review audit strategy and provide advice for both compliance, methodology & best practices to enhance the efficiency of the Bank’s internal processes.** JOB DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES• To prepare monthly action plan by audit mission to make sure the achievement of the IT audit team meets the objectives setting and IT audit unit plan.• To conduct preliminary audit analyses and prepare an audit program for audit mission macro-processes by identifying the risks per macro-process.• To execute the audit program of audit mission by macro-process to ensure that the cost-effectiveness of the audit mission, risks of internal control design and implementation are properly identified and confirmed.• Review and monitor internal audit results performed in order to make sure the completeness of audit findings, root causes, implications, and recommendations are well identified. • Prepare briefing audit results and draft internal audit reports to heads of auditee in order to make sure that they are well-understood about detailed audit findings/issues.• Assist line manager to do skill assessment of auditors under supervision and provide on-the-job training and coaching to new and existing teams to have full audit capacity and comply with audit procedures and programs.• Perform controls assessment/ evaluation of relevant General IT Controls and IT Application Controls (i.e., Test of Design and Implementation, and Operating Effectiveness)
Job Requirement: ** PERSON SPECIFICATION Knowledge & Experiences• Computer Science and CISA is preferable, Bachelor of Science Major in Internal Auditing or Information Technology related courses.• A degree in Computer Science and CISA is preferable.• Knowledge in eICBA Banking System• At least 3 years in Internal and External audit IT Audit or related field.• Has a good understanding of how a potential issue related to GITC and/or ITAC could impact the audit. Good in the documentation and report preparation• Excellent verbal and written communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills• Required skills in IT audit, Risk assessment, and compliance.• Good verbal and written communication in both Khmer and English.
Contact Info: Contact Information Talent Acquisition Unit HR Manager 093768111 recruitment@smebankcambodia.com.kh MEF Business Development Center, # S, OCIC Street, Phum Kien Khleang, Sangkat Chraoy Chongvar, Khan Chraoy Chongvar, Phnom Penh 093768111

company_name: SMALL AND MEDIUM ENTERPRISE BANK OF CAMBODIA (SME)
Job Description: I.	JOB OVERVIEWThe SME Bank plans to expand its product/services via digital channels: Mobile/Internet Banking, ATM, and payment and collection capability partnering with payment service partners.The incumbent will fulfill the IT security management role to ensure controls are implemented to mitigate risks within the organization. S/he will conduct regular reviews of the technology gaps and risks and provide regular information security training to promote awareness to the staff at all levels. S/he will also participate in solution project implementation to provide expertise and independent inputs to ensure standard compliance.** JOB DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES- Perform IT security gaps analysis to comply with NBC TRM.- Review and maintain up-to-date IT security policies and standards.- Ensure solutions implementations comply with regulatory and security requirements and standards.- Review IT change management and user access management.- Conduct regular IT security reviews.- Provide IT security training and awareness to users.- Maintain IT risk register and mitigation action plans.- Communicate between IT and internal/external audit on required assessments.- Collaborate with management and related units to improve the security posture.- Document any security breaches and assess their impact and damage.- Coordinate and document information security incident response; ensure processes and procedures are tested regularly in line with IT continuity, Business Continuity Plan (BCP).- Promote cyber security awareness at all levels of management and employees by maintaining and developing a positive culture of compliance against IT security policy, industry standards, and regulations.- Provide line manager quality analysis to support decision-making.- All other matters ancillary to the above and other related issues management may require from time to time.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Computer Science or Information Technology- 3-5 years experience in IT security management and/or IT Audit.- Knowledge of IT Risk and Governance is preferred.- Knowledge of COBIT, NIST, PCI DSS, or ISO27001.- Good command of English, communication, interpersonal, problem-solving, analytical, and organization skills.

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.
